_header: O Thou peerless Prince of Peace
Note: For other texts of this piece see 3870 and 6019.
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: A prayer to Christ — 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Miserere mei deus’

BodDou78.First Lines:
O þou pereles prynce of peeseWith all myne herte y þe
                    pray…
BodDou78.Last Lines:
…þis worlde with all his wrathe & prideThere is no
                    mene noþer mede…
BodDou78.Note: Lines 1-45 only; ends imperfectly due to loss of folio(s).
